description: 学习被动语态的基础用法：表示主语是动作的承受者

explanation.basic_structure: 主语 + be + 过去分词 + (by + 动作执行者)
basic_rules: 被动语态表示主语是动作的承受者
结构：主语 + be + 过去分词 + (by + 动作执行者)
be动词要根据时态和主语变化
动作执行者用by引出，可以省略
usage_cases: 强调动作的承受者：The book was written by Mark Twain. (这本书是马克·吐温写的)
不知道动作执行者：The window was broken. (窗户被打破了)
动作执行者不重要：English is spoken all over the world. (英语在全世界被说)
common_errors: The book was wrote by Mark Twain. (错误) → The book was written by Mark Twain. (正确)
The window was break. (错误) → The window was broken. (正确)
English is speak all over the world. (错误) → English is spoken all over the world. (正确)
usage_tips: 被动语态强调动作的承受者

present_simple: English is spoken all over the world.
The book is written by Mark Twain.
The car is made in Japan.
The letter is sent by post.
past_simple: The book was written by Mark Twain.
The car was made in Japan.
The letter was sent by post.
The house was built last year.
sentences: English is spoken all over the world.

被动语态用过去分词，break的过去分词是broken

能够正确使用be + 过去分词结构
了解被动语态表示主语是动作的承受者

assessment_criteria.satisfactory: 了解被动语态基本用法，需要加强练习
